body.recentContactsInfo: Hada waxan ku waydiinayaa in aad xasuusato cidii aad is aragteen shalayto,laga bilaabo markii aad kacday shalayto, ilaa maanta, is arag waxan uga jeedna qofka aad kulanteen ama is waydaarsateen ugu yaraan kalmado hadal ah.
body.contactTracingInfo: Waxan imika ku waydiinaya astaamaha qof kasta oo aad is aragteensida da,da iyo jinsiga sido kale waxan ku waydiinayaa in is aragiinu ahaa mid taabasho ah, sida gacan qaad, salaan laab qabasho ah, dhunkasho ama in aad wadaagtaan weel cunto oo qof kasta afkiisa gaadha.

question.residentsCount: Immisa qof ayaa ku nool guriga?

adult.isLongtimeResident: Deganaha ma ku noolaa guriga ilaa Oktoobar 2019?
adult.contactTracingDate: Xaqiiiji taariikhta aad is aragteen si aan u qoro.
adult.recentContactsSeenCount: Ma qiyaasi karta tirada dadka aad la kulantay shalay, waa kuwii aad la kulantay lakin aanad la hadlin? Shalayto

contact.name: Magaca:
contact.location: Halkeed ku kulanteen qofkaa shalay magacow mesha hada:
contact.frequency: Guud ahaan sidee qofkan kulankiinu siduu ahaa?
contact.duration: Wakhti intee leeg siisay/kugu qadatay inta aad la joogtay qofkan goobtan aad kula kulantay?

resident.sectionConsentGiven: Wakiilka ogalaasho ee deganaha si loo buuxiyo qeybtiisa.
resident.sectionConsentDenied: Deganaha diidmadiisa ogalaasho ee buuxinta qeybtan.

symptomOnset.shortnessOfBreath: Waqtigee in neefta ku dhibto bilawday?

frequency.rarely: In ka yar hal mar bishiiba
frequency.firstMeeting: Waligayba hada ka hor lama kulmin/ Hada ka hor lama kulmin

duration.1h-2h: Hal saac kana yar laba saac (hal saac kana yar 2 saac)
duration.2h-4h: Laba saac kana yar afar saac (2 kana yar 4 saac)

warning.tooFewEntries: Tiro ku filan ma soo gelin!
